com.konakartadmin.blif

Interface AdminEngineCacheMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminEngineCacheMgr, AdminEngineCacheMgrEE

    public interface AdminEngineCacheMgrIf
    Manager for caching Admin and Application engines
